data.description: Cache images of interest from the web
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I wrote this so that my xscreensaver can have lots and lots of
    images to pick from based on keywords that I choose. This idea all
    started here:

    http://bugs.debian.org/cgi-bin/bugreport.cgi?bug=247128

    When I realized that webcollage's dictionary file was "hardly used"
    (and THAT's why I get porn when I search for vegetables...) and that
    this sort of functionality would have to behave at least
    semi-responsibly to not piss off a bunch of sysadmins, I wrote this
    module/script.
